attributes.action: Support The Turkey's Somali Social and Political Effort and Stop Mahiga Initiative which misleading our National Interest.
attributes.additional_details:
Support The Turkey's Somali Social and Political Effort and Stop Mahiga Initiative which misleading our National Interest by using UN / AU and Non papered Documents and Road Map.

This is against the will of our Nation, we need Positive  support and friendship, but not UN Representative Mahiga Rad Map and African Union to misrepresent our future.

We as British Somali Society, Somali Youth Congress, Somali Women's Council, Somali National Council and Somali Transitional Council on behalf of our members and Somali People including members of the parliament, intellectual and Students are against this action towards our People and our country.

We can't accept Mahiga Initative on Somalia.

Thank you,
